attributes.action: To disregard the petition to chip all babies at birth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petitioner who wants all babies to be 'chipped at birth'cannot be serious?  Hitler tried a similar thing don't forget. What is this world coming to? Is nothing, or no one sacrosanct? We would become a nation of automotons - is this what the government wants?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
